de.orolle.bigsense.server

Class StartCloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vertx.java.platform.Verticle
      • de.orolle.bigsense.server.StartCloud

  • public class StartCloud
extends org.vertx.java.platform.Verticle
    Main for BigSenseWeb. It is executed as Vert.x has loaded this class and than instantiates it.
    Author:
    Oliver Rolle, Martin Hellwig

      • deploySSH

        private void deploySSH(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<? extends java.lang.Object>> handler)
        Deploys the SSHVerticle as worker in Vert.x environment, therefore providing SSH functionality for the update process by BigSenseUpdater.
        Parameters:
        handler - Handler is called after deployment

      • deployWebAuthentication

        private void deployWebAuthentication(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<? extends java.lang.Object>> handler)
        Deploys Authentication Service for web-interface. (IT IS NOT USED BY WEB)
        Parameters:
        handler - Handler is called after deployment

      • makeReverseConnectionServer

        private void makeReverseConnectionServer(org.vertx.java.core.net.NetSocket androidSSH,
                               int remotePort,
                               org.vertx.java.core.buffer.Buffer storeBuffer)
        Creates a ReverseConnectionServer which waits on SSHClient to connect. The data which received on this server is passed to the TCP connection made by the Android Smartphone.
        Parameters:
        androidSSH - Android Connection
        remotePort - Port to listen on for SSHClient connection
        storeBuffer - the store buffer
